desc: This book adopts a detailed and methodological algorithmic approach to explain the concepts of pattern recognition. While the text provides a systematic account of its major topics such as pattern representation and nearest neighbour based classifiers, current topics — neural networks, support vector machines and decision trees — attributed to the recent vast progress in this field are also dealt with.
title: Introduction to Pattern Recognition and Machine Learning (IISc Lecture Notes – Volume 5) (IISC Lecture Notes (Hardcover))
